targets.expr: sum(dqc_jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$dpe_job_name", jobId=~"$jobId", area="heap"}) by (jobId) *100/sum(dqc_jvm_memory_max_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$dpe_job_name", jobId=~"$jobId", area="heap"}) by (jobId)

sum(dqc_jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$dpe_job_name", jobId=~"$jobId", area="nonheap"}) by (jobId) *100 /sum(dqc_jvm_memory_max_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$dpe_job_name", jobId=~"$jobId", area="nonheap"}) by (jobId)

panels.description: The percent of time spent on Garbage Collection over all CPUs assigned to the JVM process.

targets.expr: sum(rate(dqc_jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$dpe_job_name", jobId=~"$jobId"}[1m])) by (job, jobId) / on (job, jobId) dqc_system_cpu_count

panels.title: GC Pressure

targets.expr: dqc_disk_total_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$dpe_job_name", type=~"$storage_type", jobId=~"$jobId"} - dqc_disk_free_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$dpe_job_name", type=~"$storage_type", jobId=~"$jobId"}
